content: --मुख {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (खा|खी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) {1} having a beautiful face, lovely. {2} pleasing. {3} disposed to, eager for; <ls>Ki. 6. 42.</ls> (--खः {1} a learned man. {2} an epithet of Garuḍa. {3} of Gaṇeśa. {4} of Śiva. (--खं the scratch of a finger-nail. (--खा, --खी {1} a handsome woman. {2} a mirror.
